name: mollusk
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
any animal that has a soft body, no spine, and is often covered with a shell. Many mollusks live in water: Oysters are mollusks, as are snails and cuttlefish.

Add to word list
Add to word list
any of a large group of animals that have soft bodies, no spine (= supporting bones), and usually a hard shell: Oysters, clams, and snails are mollusks.
